hero.headline:
Bitcoin powers El Salvador
and your financial future.
hero.subtitle: Digital currency helps you save, grow, and get fair loans for a better life for your family.

how.title: How does it work?
how.subtitle: We provide loans with fair conditions to women and communities that help them improve their financial health.
how.description1: Bad financial health is plaguing the world. Over 90% of the global population is either living paycheck-to-paycheck without any savings, or is not able to acknowledge the disruptive change that is happening to the financial system.
how.description2: Bitcoin is leading this change and enabling a broad ecosystem of equitable financial services without intermediaries. But most people – especially those that in most need – don't get it and don't have access to this new world.
how.description3: We are particularly focused on empowerment of women and merchants. We care especially for vulnerable populations such as victims of violence and micro merchants from poor communities, to whom we aim to provide support using digital tools and mentor network.
how.description4: You can quickly create your profile, set a goal and apply for a loan. You will get an instant reply thanks to Growr – the global decentralized protcol for lending, running on top of the Bitcoin network.

fair-loans.title: Fair loans made easy.
fair-loans.description: The Peseta app is a simple and secure way for consumers and merchants to easily apply for loans on top of the Bitcoin network. Peseta especially empowers women, often locked out of the traditional loan process, to quickly obtain fair loans at low interest rates using open banking data and smart contracts.
fair-loans.step-1-content: Link your bank account and social profiles to Peseta to create your personal financial identity.
fair-loans.step-2-content: Use the Peseta app and your financial identity to apply for a loan and get an instant response.
fair-loans.step-3-content: The Peseta app has all the tools to manage every aspect of your loan transactions, withraw the amount to your Chivo wallet and easily pay it off to build your credit score.
fair-loans.step-4-content: Learning the features and benefits of Bitcoin through short tutorials earns you fractional bitcoin to build wealth and pay off loans.
